extDescription.message: 참과 탭의 상태를 저장하고 복원합니다. 자동 저장도 지원합니다.

letsSaveLabel.message: Let's save the session by clicking the lower right button.

noConnectionErrorLabel.message: Multiple popups can not be opened at the same time.

ifOpenNewWindowCaptionLabel.message: If unchecked, the session overwrites the current window.

ifLazyLoadingCaptionLabel.message:
When opening a session, the contents of each page are not loaded until you select the tab.
If unchecked, memory usage greatly increases when session is restored.

isRestoreWindowPositionCaptionLabel.message: Restore windows position and size when opening session.

ifOpenLastSessionWhenStartUpCaptionLabel.message: When browser starts up, restore the session that was closed the last time.

ifAutoSaveCaptionLabel.message: Save the session every X minutes.

autoSaveLimitCaptionLabel.message: Maximum number of saved sessions (in this way).

ifAutoSaveWhenCloseLabel.message: Save the session when window was closed

ifAutoSaveWhenCloseCaptionLabel.message: Save the session when closing the window or when exiting browser.

autoSaveWhenCloseCaptionLabel.message: Maximum number of saved sessions (in this way).

useTabTitleforAutoSaveLabel.message: Use page title for auto save session name

useTabTitleforAutoSaveCaptionLabel.message: When saving a session automatically, use the title of the opened page as the name of the session.

ifBackupCaptionLabel.message: When browser starts up, create a backup file of sessions and save it in the download folder.

backupFolderCaptionLabel.message: Specify the folder to save the backup file. The save location is limited to the folder under browser download folder.

backupFilesLimitCaptionLabel.message: When the number of backup files exceeds this value, they are deleted in ascending order of oldest.

ifSavePrivateWindowCaptionLabel.message: If unchecked, ignores the private window when saving the session.

ifSupportTstCaptionLabel.message:
Restore tree state of Tree Style Tab.
When this option is enabled, it takes time to restore the session.

tstDelayCaptionLabel.message: To restore the state of the tree, wait time is required to open the tab. Increase this value if the tree is not restored correctly.

truncateTitleLabel.message: Display session name within one line

truncateTitleCaptionLabel.message: If the session name in the session list extends over more than one line, it is truncated on one line and displayed.

toolBarPopupCaptionLabel.message: Specify the style of the toolbar popup.

importCaptionLabel.message:
Load sessions saved on the computer and add them to the session List.
It also supports SessionManager's session file (.session).

urlImportCaptionLabel.message:
Create a session from list of URLs and add it to the session list.
Format: <URL> <page title (optionally)>

exportCaptionLabel.message: Save all sessions to the computer.

donationCaptionLabel.message:
Thank you for using Tab Session Manager.
Your support will be a big encouragement, as I continue to develop the add-on.
If you like Tab Session Manager, I would be pleased if you could consider donating.

warningRemoveAllMessage.message: Delete all sessions. Are you sure?

replacedPageMessage.message: 이 페이지는 Tab Session Manager로 열릴 수 없습니다.
